meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Arabic language.
meanings.sent1: She studied the rabic language in school.
meanings.sent2: The rabic alphabet is used in many countries.
meanings.sent3: The rabic words sounded like music to her ears.
meanings.sent4: His rabic accent was so charming, it captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The rabic culture is rich in history and tradition.

meanings.sent1: The document was filled with rabic text.
meanings.sent2: She practiced writing her name in rabic letters.
meanings.sent3: The rabic symbols on the sign were beautifully intricate.
meanings.sent4: His rabic handwriting was elegant and precise.
meanings.sent5: The book was printed in rabic font for authenticity.

meanings.definition: A style of script used in Arabic calligraphy.
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate details of rabic calligraphy.
meanings.sent2: The artist specialized in creating rabic scripts.
meanings.sent3: The rabic script on the wall was a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His tattoo featured a beautiful rabic design.
meanings.sent5: The rabic calligraphy added a touch of elegance to the room.
